attributes.action: “ring fence” all revenue raised from environmentally related taxes and use funds so raised to support the behavioural change targeted by the tax. For example; Funds raised from Road Charging should be used to improve and make travel easier/safer by other means such as train/bus/taxi/cycle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The approach described would be more convincing to the public that the Government is serious about really tackling environmental issues rather than looking for clever ways of raising more revenue for the Treasury coffers. The people of this country are currently highly sceptical of so called environmental taxes when the revenue so raised is not used to improve or find solutions for the situation/activity from which the tax is raised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
